local_sensors.title: Configure Local Sensors
local_sensors.description: Weather cards do not always show all these values.

data.mapping_type: Select which mapping you want for the 'Weather Condition' property (Icon).

data_description.mapping_type:
Meteocat
The condition value will be automatically taken from the official Meteocat forecast (fixed mapping, not editable).

Custom
The condition value will be taken from a local numeric sensor. You will need to define (on the next screen) a mapping between the local sensor values and the conditions supported by Home Assistant (ex: clear-night, sunny, partlycloudy, cloudy, rainy, pouring, lightning, snowy, fog, etc.).

condition_mapping_custom.title: Configure Weather Condition Mapping
condition_mapping_custom.description: Select the sensor that contains the condition value and the mapping to be used. You can enter multiple values separated by commas.
